name: VibeHive - Social Forum Platform
description: A dynamic social forum platform that enables users to connect through meaningful conversations and shared experiences. Built with React.js and powered by Firebase.
features: Personalized profiles with user information and activity history
Users can create, edit, and delete their own posts
Tools to manage reported comments and inappropriate content
Users receive notifications for relevant activities

name: Jointly - Event Management Platform
description: A modern, responsive event management platform built with React that allows users to create, manage, and join community events. The platform features user authentication, event filtering, and a beautiful UI with animations.
features: Authenticated users can create new events
Filter events by type (Workshop, Conference, Meetup, etc.)
Find events by title or description
Register for events you're interested in

name: ShopMate - Shop Inventory Management System
description: A modern, responsive inventory management system designed to help shopkeepers efficiently organize and manage their shop operations. The platform supports product tracking, sales record management, and employee supervision, making day-to-day business tasks seamless and hassle-free.
features: Add and manage product listings with details such as name, price, and stock
Track sales records and generate reports
Update product stock in real-time after each sale
Search and filter products by name or category
Secure user authentication for shop owners and employees
